releaseNotes:
Change-logs
 - Added support to ThunderPlug CPU hotplug driver.
 - Moved all CPU Boost settings into a new page (link in CPU).
 - Moved Create Update Channel option into a new activity (improved & simplified).
 - Updated build tools to latest.
 - Updated Script Manager to show success dialog even if the output is empty.
 - Removed circular image view from app (reduced app size).
 - Added a debug mode in Flasher (capture full log if enabled).
 - Added LMK fast run control switch.
 - Miscellaneous changes.
